title: The Sentimental Yearner
marks:
Signature, Date; Inscription

copyright in penci LR: [Grant Wood 1936]
text: Grant Wood made this and other drawings for a deluxe edition of Sinclair Lewis' biting satire Main Street. Though the drawings were identified only as archetypes, the "sentimental yearner" is clearly Raymond Wutherspoon, the much-derided prim middlebrow aesthete shoe salesman who eventually emerged as a war-hero.
